title: Gratin of chard and new potatoes
description: Serve this gratin as a first course, as a side dish with grilled chicken, or perhaps just on its own with a fresh tomato salad and good bread on the side.
ingredients: 5 tbsp olive oil, plus extra for greasing
450g/1lb ruby or Swiss chard, stems and broad ribs cut into 1cm/½in pieces, leaves finely sliced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
½ tbsp capers, rinsed and drained
400g/14oz new potatoes, scrubbed, boiled until just tender, drained and sliced
